hackathon-judges.judge-role: Sr. Director, Product Platform at RingCentral
Director, Platform Product Marketing at RingCentral

hackathon-eligibility: Open to all developers. Max 5 members per team. Must be present on both day to be eligible for awards.
hackathon-requirements: Participants must present their projects in-person on day 2 to be considered for awards.
hackathon-rules:
Eligible Hacks:
1. Build State-of-the-Art Chatbots
Build a chatbot from scratch or port your existing messaging, virtual assistant, customer service, or e-commercial bots from other frameworks to support the RingCentral Glip bot framework.
 
2. Create Awesome Customer Experiences
Build interactive experiences using RingCentral’s SMS, MMS, group MMS, voice, and fax APIs to stay connected with employees, customers, and partners.
 
3. Connect Anywhere on Any Device
Power up your web app with RingCentral’s WebRTC SDK to make and receive calls with advanced call control functionality in any WebRTC-enabled browser.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $5,000 to be split among team members
$2,000 to be spit among team members
$1,000 to be split among team members
